synopsis: Music video explaining solutions to various mathematical problems that aired as part of NHK’s Minna no Uta program.

title: Shijin to Tsubame
synopsis: A poet finds inspiration from a barn swallow.

title: Super Mario no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis:
A young boy and his little sister are playing Super Mario Bros. 3 on their Famicom, when their mother calls and tells them to come to her shop, however, by the time she is finished at work some time has gone by and the young boy is still playing Super Mario Bros. 3. His little sister gets impatient and leaves without him. She is too young to know where the shop is and she gets lost. The boy then runs off to look for his lost sister and almost gets hit by a driver, which was Mario. He gets out and gives him a small lecture on being safe when crossing the road.

(Source: Super Mario Wiki)

title: Vary Peri
synopsis:
The Sweetsheart Kingdom  is a magical world filled with various sweets and pastries, inhabited by animal people who are good patisseries and cooks experting on each dessert. The kingdom's only Princess, Mousse Bibi is soon going to ascend to the throne as the new Queen, however all she cared on her life is to taste various kinds of cakes and sweets. One day, Lyan, her royal adviser, set up a plan by making her suffer Aguesia. As she is shocked that she can no longer taste anything, he told her that the only way to cure her condition is to search for the legendary magic called Delicious Miracle. She immediately left the castle and venture outside, not knowing to her that Lyne is doing this to eradicate her.

Upon her arrival at the town called Cake Village, she first met a denizen of the village named Mocha Dennis, who is very obsessed on his looks. Though the meeting between both him and Benetta is unsettling. She is also unaware that she possesses a hidden potential that would help her search for the legendary magic and be the key on changing the fate of the Sweetsheart Kingdom once and for all!

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Meng Xiang Shou Wei Zhe
synopsis: G.G. Bonds enters the realm of dreams to stop evil's power from growing. They must get the citizens of Crystal City to remember their dreams so that the 5 element powers can recharge.

title: Capsule Boy 2: Ujuleul Jikyeola
synopsis: The second season of Capsule Boy. SBS took over broadcasting the show. The art style has been changed for a more modern anime-esque appearance and some voice actors did not reprise their character's roles.

title: Kana Kana ka na
synopsis: An official "Minna no Uta" music video for Saori Yuki's song Kana Kana ka na.

title: Mama no Earring
synopsis: A little girl adores her mother's pearl earrings.

title: Off Stage
synopsis: A song about birds who delivers dreams to those sleeping under the light of a shooting star.

title: Totan Yane no Waltz
synopsis: A cat's waltz upon a tin roof as an old man plays the fiddle.

title: Warau Tsuki
synopsis:
A play on the ancient Chinese puzzle of tangram.

(Source: British animation awards)

title: Watashi to Kotori to Suzu to
synopsis: The poem Watashi to Kotori to Suzu to was originally written by Misuzu Kaneko. Composer Ryuichi Sugimoto converted the poem into a song and it was sung by Aragaki Tsutomu. This song was animated for NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Bian Shen Xiao Ying Xiong
synopsis: The Fairy World has been suffering attacks from all sorts of monsters. G.G. Bond by accident becomes a monster and now has to fight against both sides.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Guang Ming Shou Wei Zhe
synopsis: Twin City, as legend has it, is an evil city which was born at the time when Crystal City was created. There is a mirror-like lake above the city which has a horrifying power. It enables people to face the darkest side deep within their hearts. This darkness manifests as the person's opposite. The heroes must send these malicious beings back to their realm before they tear Crystal City apart.

title: Anata no Koe
synopsis: Music video for the song Anata no Koe by Mone Kamishiraishi, that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The song was released as a single two days later. The video was animated by Ryouzou Oominato.

title: Arui Tekoteko
synopsis: Of a pair of shoes, the left shoe is an animate object, who is excited to be used by a boy to take his dog on a walk.

title: Grimm Douwa Anime Series
synopsis: This OVA tells three Brothers Grimm fairy tales: The Hut in the Forest, Little Red Riding Hood, and Snow-White and Rose-Red.

title: Huoli Shaonian Wang zhi You Quan Yingxiong
synopsis:
Another reboot within the Huoli Shaonian Wang franchise again focusing on new characters, new story, unrelated to the previous seasons.

Dark energy is growing threatening to ruin the balance of the world. 5 yoyo toys were summoned and 5 teenagers were chosen to master them. They must learn to work as a team to channel the magical spiritual power to push back the dark forces who too have harnessed humans. The magical spiritual power gives them superhero abilities such as flaming armor, the ability of flight, super speed, and water-bending.

title: Senaka de Twist
synopsis: A Minna no Uta music video sung by George Tokoro and animated by Tameo Kohanawa.

title: Shima no Kuregata no Hanashi
synopsis: A stop-motion puppet animation fairy tale style story where on a warm island in the south a man encounters a woman.

title: Yume Miru Koneko
synopsis:
A music video about a cat named Yume (which also means "dream" in Japanese). The song itself parodies the songs Der Flohwalzer (in Japan named as Neko Fun Jatta / I Stepped on a Cat) and Beautiful Dreamer (Yumemiru Hito) depending on whether or not "Yume" is being seen as a real cat or as a metaphorical dream or as a dream Yume the cat is having.

The music video was aired for 1 month before becoming lost media. In 2016 the Minna no Uta Hakkutsu Project (Minna no Uta Excavation Project) was able to find discover a copy and the music video was saved and re-aired once again after 34 years.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Chao Xing Meng Chong
synopsis:
Attempting to make GG Bond the partner for Iron Fist, Mr. Mihoo disguised himself as a school teacher, showing GG Bond the charm of interstellar shuttling. GG Bond took his invitation and became an agent. As GG Bond’s pet and mission partner, Iron Fist had the power to absorb everything. His biggest secret was that his stomach linked to the infinite fifth dimension. One day Iron Fist ate the stone of eternal energy. The universe would lose balance without the stone. GG Bond had to enter into Iron Fist’s fifth dimension searching for it. After all adventures and difficulties, he finally brought it out and saved the world.

(Source: Official YouTube channel)

title: Minna no Taabou Konnichiwa
synopsis: Taabou travels around saying "hello" to everyone.

title: Ni ga Mushi Ojisan
synopsis: A angry looking old man who walks his equally angry looking old dog scares children away.

title: Ni wa no Kotori
synopsis: A short story about a bird who invites everyone to his birthday party only to find out they decided to go an play at another bird's house.

title: Snowdrop
synopsis: A metaphorical song dedicated to the the sensitivity of delicate girls through the view of a teenager who cherishes their family. The lyrics were written by 15 year old Asuka Hayashi who had just debuted two years prior.

title: Tanabata Monogatari
synopsis: An educational anime about the history and founding of the Tanabata holiday in Japan.

title: Ukkari Pénélope (2017)
synopsis: The 4th season of Ukkari Pénélope.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Zhong Ji Jue Zhan - Qian Ye Pian
synopsis:
A prequel TV series setting up for the Zhu Zhu Xia: Zhong Ji Jue Zhan feature film. 

G.G. Bond's father while exploring ruins gets sucked into a dimension of evil through the Dark Gate. He is bestowed power and knowledge and becomes corrupted as the King of Darkness. Ancient monsters are sent through the cracks of the gate to attack G.G. Bond and his team as the 5 elemental powers are stronger than the King of Darkness. By weakening the team, only then can the King of Darkness forcibly open the gate to unless a reign of terror on the Fairy Tale world.

title: Ha Ji Me Te
synopsis: Music video for the song Ha Ji Me Te by Kyouko Koizumi that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Kouji Nanke.

title: Karasu to Kaki no Tane
synopsis: A song about the circle of life. A crow eats a persimmon and poops the seed out. The elements let the seed sprout and grow. It turns into a new persimmon tree and a new crow comes along and repeats the process.

title: Mahou no Ryouri: Kimi kara Kimi e
synopsis: An inspirational song about it is difficult to dream when being scolded but encourages kids to allow themselves to feel these emotions because it is vital in growing up.

title: Mametarou Ganbare
synopsis: Shows the journey a corn kernel takes to grow into a fully mature plant.

title: Mori no Hito to Shoutengu-chan
synopsis: A small tengoku practices as much as he can to be an attendant. While practicing flying in the forest, he hears the plea of a parent bird.

title: Nendjuugyouji Animation Series
synopsis: An animation teaching tool meant to explain how holidays were created and why we celebrate them. Such as why red carnations are used for Mother's Day or koinobori are used for Children's Day.

title: Ohayou no Uta
synopsis: Expressing a state of a simple weekday morning, this picture-drama good morning song celebrates the happiness of life.

title: Oniichan Zurui
synopsis: A younger brother hates how his older brother is unfair. He takes his toys, gets, gets to choose the TV channel so the younger brother decides to eat a lot in order to become the bigger brother through sheer growth spurts.

title: Oyayubi-hime
synopsis: A stop-motion puppet animation adaptation of Hans Christian Anderson's Thumbelina.

title: Sakai Noriko no Yoiko no Ohanashi Hiroba
synopsis: Sakai Noriko narrated classic fairy tales done as novella shorts. They were released in a Japanese version as well as an English version to help Japanese children learn English.

title: San Tarou to Kaguya-hime no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: A traffic safety anime featuring 3 Tarous (Tarou Urashima, Momotarou, Kintarou) and Kaguya-hime.

title: Shouka Robo Zeres: Fire Dragon wo Taose!
synopsis: A fire safety anime with a sci-fi mecha flare. When an ocarina is blown, the mecha Zeres arrives to extinguish the flames.

title: Tsuki to Azarashi
synopsis:
Based on a children's book of the same name.

The film teaches accepting grief and seeking modest salvation.

title: Yot-chan no Fushigina Crayon
synopsis: A little girl receives magic crayons from her Grandma that brings to life anything she draws.

title: Kagee Anime Series
synopsis: Shadow puppet animation. This OVA tells four old Japanese tales.

title: Kyou mo Chappy End
synopsis: Chappy is a portmanteau of Cha (Tea) and Happy. The song praises tea and how a warm cup can help improve your mood from a crummy day.

title: Mama ga Hakuchou Datta hi
synopsis: Music video for the song Mama ga Hakuchou Datta hi by Yuko Doi that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Kouji Nanke.

title: Tanoshii Ekaki Uta
synopsis: An educational DVD series meant to teach children about animals and objects through ekaki uta (drawing song).

title: Yuukai Tsuresari ni Awanai
synopsis: An OVA series educating kids on how to protect themselves against kidnappers. Yuukai Tsuresari ni Awanai is aimed at infants and lower elementary schoolers.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Da Nao Huang Gong
synopsis:
The series is about the titular character, an intelligent and mischievous pig named G.G. Bond (猪猪侠, meaning "Pig Hero") born with superpowers. He is an orphan under the care and custody of Dr. Mihu, his teacher who enjoys inventing different gadgets. 

This is considered "season 0" due to its short length. Originally it was advertised as a for-TV movie.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Boku no Kachi
synopsis: Music video for the song Boku no Kachi by Japanese reggae artist NAHKI that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Kouji Nanke.

title: Boku to Déjà vu
synopsis: Music video for the song Boku to Déjà vu by Yuki Hyoudou that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Kouji Nanke.

title: Fushou Shita Senro to Tsuki
synopsis:
Based on a children's book of the same name.

The film teaches the importance of mind and that everything is connected.

title: Ohanashi de Te Koi
synopsis: An anime adaptation of NHK Radio two children's folktales that were broadcasted in 1954.

title: Okome Kakurenbo
synopsis: A song about rice. It's got a great taste, sometimes when you blow your nose a random grain comes out, other times you might step on a stray one dried up on the ground and for something so small it sure hurts a lot! The food is so much more familiar than you think it is.

title: Oshiri no Yama wa Everest
synopsis: The second music video for NHK's Minna no Uta program to feature UrumaDelvi's original butt-biting bug, five years after the original song was broadcast. We follow Oshiri Kajiri Mushi XVIII as he climbs Mount Everest in search of a legendary golden butt, yodelling all the way to the top.

title: Power Battle Watch Car Season 2
synopsis: The second season of Power Battle Watch Car.

title: Yuki Daruman no Fuyumichi Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: A snowman teaches traffic safety for slippery icy winter roads.

title: Zetsumetsu Kigu-shun.
synopsis: A dialogue-less anime about endangered species where they only say "-shun.". Episodes are streamed on the anime's official Youtube channel and Twitter, and Kadokawa's official Youtube channel as they are co-creators of the brand.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Yong Chuang Juren Dao
synopsis: Jack the Robber loses his magic bean. G.G. Bond and friends plant it and a giant beanstalk grows. Up in the clouds there is a new world called Titan Island. They triggered the Titan's alarm and the bean's vine is severed. The team may not be able to make it back home between fighting off the Titan as well as Jack the Robber's attempt to steal treasure and sabotage the team.

title: Dekkai Totto March
synopsis: A music video for the song Dekkai Totto March by Duke Aces that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Hachikadzuki-hime
synopsis: An anime adaptation of the Hachikadzuki-hime Japanese folk tale.

title: Hatachi no Ryouma with Kurofune-kun!
synopsis:
A Shinagawa ward tourism anime. The anime was made in honor of the 150th anniversary of the Meiji Restoration.
 
It stars Sakamoto Ryouma, a historical figure who took part in overthrowing the Tokugawa shogunate. He spent most of his youth in Shinagawa under the Tosa Clan residence and a statue of him was erected in his honor. He's considered a hero of Edo and worked as a cost guard/battery staff when Commodore Perry landed in Japan with black ships.

Here, the anime has a young Ryouma encounter Kurofune-kun, a black ship chibi mascot, as they time slip to modern Shinagawa. Kurofune-kun shows him the sights and they meet other historical figures who time slipped.

title: Mama Gomennasai
synopsis: A little boy apologizes to his mom about all the bad pranks he's been pulling.

title: Nyani ga Nyandaa Nyandaa Kamen no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: A traffic safety anime starring the cast of Nyani ga Nyandaa Nyandaa Kamen.

title: Ojiichan no Tomato
synopsis: An educational film concerning the bullying and discrimination of elderly handicapped people.

title: Shimajirou to Ururu no Hero Land
synopsis: (No synopsis yet.)

title: Aware! Meisaku-kun: Q&A Corner
synopsis:
An Aware! Meisaku-kun question & answer corner. These shorts are web-exclusives. Fans of the TV series can mail in their questions about the characters or past events in the show and select ones will be answered by the characters themselves through the web shorts. 

It is recommended to view the web shorts after episode 93 of the TV series as a non-antagonistic Tsurukou is present to answer questions.

title: Kensaku to Enjin no Atarashii Tomodachi: Query Toujou!
synopsis: Yahoo!'s Kensaku to Enjin franchise gained a new character: Query. She wants to be an idol, loves fashion, and gets quite the motor mouth when angry. This short 2D animation debuts her on stage.

title: Kensaku to Enjin no Happy Birthday
synopsis: An entirely 3DCG Happy Birthday episode of Kensaku to Enjin. It was meant to congratulate the viewer's birthday rather than it being the birthday/anniversary of the Kensaku to Enjin franchise or Yahoo! who owns the franchise.

title: Kkoma Sinseon Tao 2
synopsis: A direct continuation of Kkoma Sinseon Tao.

title: Kozou no Koushin
synopsis: A Japanese rendition of Henry Mancini's song Baby Elephant Walk which was originally created for the 1962 American film "Hatari!".

title: Lu La La
synopsis: A man receives a strange egg for Christmas which hatches a heart creature.

title: Mina no Bousai Mura Dzukuri
synopsis: A typhoon hits Mina's village. As everyone begins disaster recovery they also being to implement safety precautions for future typhoons.

title: Moufu no Hi
synopsis: On a cold winter morning, a warm blanket is an oasis for everyone.

title: Nikoniko♪Connie-chan
synopsis: The 8-year old character Connie-chan from the Japanese children's block Ponkikki Kids (successor to the famous Hirake! Ponkikki show) gets her own anime now as a 18-year old attending Tokyo University.

title: Okaasan no Yasashii te
synopsis: An educational film highlighting the importance of how impressionable children are by their family members.

title: Sanpou Shoujo
synopsis:
An adaptation of a children's novel of the same name published in 1973. Endo Hiroko is the author, who was inspired to write the story from a tale her father told her as a child.

It follows a 13 year old girl named Aki. During a pilgrimage to Sensou-ji (a Buddhist temple located in Asakusa, Tokyo), she found a mistake in the sangaku. News spread quickly of her intellect and eventually landed upon Arima Yoriyuki, the lord of the Kurume Domain (he himself was famous for finding the rational approximation of pi). He hired Aki to become an arithmetic teacher for the region's princess, but hired others as well. In a math competition, Aki fought against other geniuses and prodigies, all for the hopes of earning a wage so that she may one day open a school for poor children so that she can teach them arithmetic as well.

title: Shounen Muku Hatojuu Monogatari
synopsis: An educational film that follows the famous Japanese writer Muku Hatojuu in his boyhood as he gets bullied.

title: Sylvanian Families: Mini Story 2nd Season
synopsis: (No synopsis yet.)

title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tai Lang: Zhi Yang Nian Xi Yang Yang
synopsis:
In Green Green Pastures, there exists a much loved legend about valiant dragon-slayers who lived in the Stone Age. Having grown up listening to stories about their awe-inspiring adventures, Pleasant Goat and Fatty Goat have always wanted to become dragon slayers themselves. While trying to make this dream come true, Fatty Goat inadvertently switches bodies with Big Big Wolf, and the two, along with Pleasant Goat, soon find themselves transported back to the Stone Age. When an evil dragon appears and threatens Stone Age Green Green Pastures, Fatty Goat, Big Big Wolf and Pleasant Goat must rise up to the dragon-slaying challenge. 

(Source: YesAsia)

title: Xiong Chumo Zhi: Guonian
synopsis: Released two days before the Chinese New Year, the feature itself covers the topic of the New Year where Logger Vick wants to go back to his hometown to visit family. But a first class ticket on the train home is something he cannot afford. Briar and Bramble decide to help him out.

title: Xiong Chumo Zhi: Nianhuo
synopsis: The second New Year special, this time released a day before the Chinese New Year. Logger Vick finds himself unexpectedly unemployed for the upcoming New Year. In order to afford presents, he takes on a temporary forest ranger job.  Briar and Bramble are quire mistrusting of him now that his new job requires that he protect the forest.

title: Daruma-san ga Koronda
synopsis: A music video for the song Daruma-san ga Koronda by Kozue Saitou that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Hana Ichi Monme
synopsis:
A music video adaptation of the classic Japanese children's game. The game is similar to the game Red Rover in the Western world. 

(Source: Wiki)

title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Bokura no Ohimesama
synopsis: Keroleen gets teleported to a fantasy land through a magical pond. There is a handsome prince who charms her. He wants her to visit more but the boys discover that his kingdom is not a righteous one. The gang has to go save Keroleen and the fate of their town from the false prince.

title: Mina no Mura no Gomi Soudou
synopsis:
Mina's family has a baby goat, but it dies from eating a plastic bag left in the paddy field. Some children are absent from school due to health problems caused by waste. So, the villagers have a meeting to discuss what they can do to improve waste management.

(Source: ACCU)

title: Ninja Tamamaru: Toukaidou Gojuusan-ji
synopsis: The third season of Ninja Tamamaru.

title: Ojiisan no Densha
synopsis: A boy and his grandfather love playing trains at home. Even if it means he has to cut baseball practice early.

title: Shampoo Ouji
synopsis: Prince Shampoo lives in the clean and shiny Bubble Kingdom. He's bored with his life and decides to jump out of the protective dome and explore the dirty things of the outer world. Here he encounters various people and understands what dirty and cleanliness really mean in the world.

title: Yasashi-sa no Tamatebako
synopsis: A town full of anthropomorphic animals shows kindness to each other.

title: Zukkoke Sannin-gumi no Jitensha Kyoushitsu
synopsis: An educational bicycle safety video for kids featuring the Zukkoke Sannin-gumi cast.

title: Appare! Momotarou no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: The cast of the Japanese folktale Momotarou teach traffic safety.

title: Chuldong! Super Wings 2
synopsis: The second season of Chuldong! Super Wings. One major change in the story is that uncle Jimbo has retired to travel the world and his niece, Sky, takes over being the main traffic controller for the airport.

title: Helen to Tomoni: Anne Sullivan
synopsis:
Anne Sullivan is the woman who became a tutor for Helen Keller, a girl who was deaf, dumb, and blind. Anne decides to be her tutor to give Helen joy of life, no matter how little. She stays with Helen all the time and dedicates herself to Helen's education. However, things doesn't go as well as she expects and she has a very difficult time day to day. On the other side, she has hope, and teaches braille to Helen. One summer’s day, Helen was given well water in her hand, and finally she understood the meaning of the word 'Water'.

(Source: Official Site)

title: Hoshi to Niji to
synopsis: Stars twinkling in the sky and a bright rainbow crossing the sky. There's no need for tears with a world so beautiful. The music video invokes these thoughts through stop-motion paper cut-outs with a shadow puppet flair.

title: Hoshino-kun no Ni Rui-da
synopsis: An educational film meant to teach morals to elementary school children.

title: Kkoma Sinseon Tao
synopsis:
This Korean and Chinese co-production series focuses on Tao, a young boy with magical powers, as he attends school to become a wizard. Each episode was composed of two stories.

(Source: Wiki)

title: Kuusou Suizokukan
synopsis: Kuusou Suizokukan features characters that are inspired by the sea creatures in a future aquarium like rabbit-penguins, parakeet-sea lions, and bear-jellyfish.

title: Makehen de! Roku-nen San-kumi no Hanshin Daishinsai
synopsis: An educational film about the Great Hanshin earthquake (aka Kobe earthquake), focusing on a class and how they bounced back from their sorrow.

title: Minna Tomodachi
synopsis: An educational animation on the problems of bullying and friendship.

title: Naite Ita Onnanoko
synopsis: A music piece about a girl who is sad waiting for her mother to come back from Tokyo.

title: Nintama Rantarou no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: A traffic safety anime starring the cast of Nintama Rantarou.

title: Ponta Monogatari
synopsis: A song about a tanuki named Ponta who struggles using his tanuki powers.

title: Taiyou to Tsuki no Kodomo-tachi
synopsis: A family watches as their daughter grows up under the warm glow of the sun and moon and their love.

title: Tomoyo
synopsis: A warm heart of friendship extended from South Korea to Japan in wake of the 2011 Touhoku earthquake and tsunami.

title: Tsubiregg Tsuburegg March
synopsis: Anthropomorphic eggs go through a march.

title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tai Lang: Zhi Xi Qi Yang Yang Guo She Nian
synopsis:
In the face of impending disaster, the animal world is looking to the Mythical Ark for salvation. The problem is that only the snake tribe can operate the ark, and the snakes have already escaped to Utopia. To save the animals, Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf travel to Utopia to convince the snakes to help. In the process, they become friends, and the snakes agree to help. However, Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf decide to stay behind to save their homes. 

(Source: YesAsia)

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Yong Chuang Weilai Cheng
synopsis:
This time, G.G. Bond is sent to 2080 to find a world divided, where the poor live on a lower, polluted level. He finds that his primary school, Parents' Hope School, is about to be taken over by a competitor, Super Technology School. To defend against this, he must win sports competitions to raise funds.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Zukkoke Sannin-gumi no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: An traffic safety video for kids featuring the Zukkoke Sannin-gumi cast.

title: Alan-kun no Koutsuu Rule wo Mamorou ne!
synopsis: Alan and his alien buddies crash land on Earth and have to learn traffic safety.

title: Amefuri Kuma no Ko
synopsis:
A song by Tomoyo Harada & Keiichi Suzuki.

"Rain falls in the mountain, dancing on the ground.
Forming a small stream of water a mischievous bear runs by the stream. Silently he looks down at the water, and wonders if there is a fish…"

(Source: Yamamura Animation)

title: Aru Mori no wo Hanashi: Rururu no Rule
synopsis: A story of mysterious forest that makes the watcher think about ecology and morality.

title: Ima demo Senchou to Yobarete iru Senchou no Yoru
synopsis: A sea captain enjoys a nice night slumber at home. But he ponders about all the adventures he'd had before finally drifting off.

title: Karugamo Oyako no Hi no Youjin
synopsis: An educational fire safety video for kids with an imaginative spin of a fire brigade made of talking ducks.

title: Kkoma Bus Tayo 5
synopsis: The fifth season of Kkoma Bus Tayo.

title: Oyoge! Taiyaki-kun
synopsis:
A song originally used in the children's television program Hirake Ponkikki. The popular CD was originally released in 1975. In 2008, it was released alongside an anime DVD with a music video.

The song starts by expressing how Taiyaki-kun and other taiyaki pancakes are fed up with being relentlessly cooked up on a hot plate day after day. In the song, Taiyaki-kun escapes to the sea, but ends up being caught and eaten by an angler.

(Source: Pop Matters)

title: Quiz de Manabu Pinocchio no Koutsuu Ansen
synopsis: Pinocchio learns about traffic safety.

title: Shin Manga Naruhodo Monogatari
synopsis: (No synopsis yet.)

title: Titipo Titipo
synopsis:
Say hi to Tayo's new friend - Titipo! Train Center's new born little train Titipo has just passed the driving examination and is prepared to work at the Train Village. Although Titipo dreams of becoming the best train in the world, his curious yet random personality catches him in unforeseen events and troubles everyday. Titipo expands his experience in the greater world and befriends Genie, Diesel, and other little trains. Will Titipo achieve his dream of becoming the best train? Come join the railroad journey and meet Titipo and the little train friends.

(Source: Official YouTube channel)

title: TV ga Kita hi
synopsis: Four dancers celebrate the wonders of TV.

title: Wagaya no Koutsuu Anzen: Chichi to no Yakusoku
synopsis: A kid promises her father to follow road safety. Follow her through the possible do's and don'ts children may encounter.

title: Wakamono to Koinu to Croissant
synopsis: A young man finds a puppy during a crescent moon lit night which reminds them of a croissant.

title: Yasashii Kaze
synopsis: A nice wind blows gently on some children at a park.

title: Youkoso! Ecolo Shima
synopsis: An environmental educational anime.

title: Yukai na Mezamashi Tokei
synopsis: A song about an alarm clock being used every day.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Bian Shen Zhandu
synopsis: The Kung Fu Team was endowed with the transformation power of the 5 elements. The Fairy World is in danger again and together they must combine the 5 elements to defeat evil.

title: Zukkoke Sannin-gumi no Bousai Kyoushitsu
synopsis: An educational earthquake disaster prevention video for kids featuring the Zukkoke Sannin-gumi cast.

title: Dan Fumi no Ohanashi Channel
synopsis: A low priced animated world classic fairy tale series narrated and written by the Japanese actress Fumi Dan.

title: Furusato no Nai Aki
synopsis: A young woman reminisces about the autumn season.

title: Haru wo Yobu Yume
synopsis:
A boy takes a walk outside as he notices little bits of spring starts to appear. Though in the end, it turns out he is merely dreaming it and winter is at its peak.

The music video was re-aired after 44 years due to being lost media. The Minna no Uta Hakkutsu Project (Minna no Uta Excavation Project) was able to find discover a copy of the original audio, as only the animated footage was originally saved by the NHK in the 70s.

title: Hitori Shika Inai Jibun
synopsis: An educational film meant to teach morals to middle school children.

title: Kotatsu Musume de Teketekete
synopsis: A little girl gets a kotatsu stuck to her.

title: McDull: Fan Bao Qibing
synopsis:
The 6th animated McDull feature film (7th film the franchise overall).

The film sees a grotesque monster arrive from outer space. Humans are proving defenceless; after an Ultraman-like superhero, Spamerman, also flunks his rescue mission, the safety of the planet is left in the hands of McDull, the kindergarten kid who, with his sheer passion for science, invents a formidable robot based on designs of home appliances.

(Source: Edmund Lee from South China Morning Post)

title: Otsukisama Light
synopsis: Kids play in the park to late and return home thanks to the moon light helping guide the way.

title: Shikato
synopsis:
Shikato can only walk in a straight line, which means that whether colliding into objects or falling off of things, something funny is always happening.

(Source: UrumaDelvi Site)

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Jimu Shijie de Tonghua
synopsis:
When GG Bond's grandfather, EE Bond, tries to save the dinosaur from extinction by traveling back 60 million years, he accidentally winds up in the Brick Kingdom, a fairy tale world built by blocks, along with half of the rest of the city. Since they cannot leave, they slowly transform the world with technology like their own. His grandson, GG Bond, follows in his grandfather's footsteps as an Assembler, somebody who can build the blocks of the Brick Kingdom into anything. He uses these skills to fight evil.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Chibi Maruko-chan no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: A traffic safety film starring the cast of Chibi Maruko-chan.

title: Kkoma Bus Tayo 4
synopsis: The fourth season of Kkoma Bus Tayo.

title: Saraba Jamaica
synopsis: An uplifting song about the beautiful country of Jamaica.

title: Shinkaigyo no March
synopsis: Music video directed by Kousuke Sugimoto for the song Shinkaigyo no March by Youka Wao that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Te no Naka no Mahou
synopsis: Hands are magical. You can draw with them, grasp the reigns of a carousal, and reach out to be called up.

title: Tokyo 2020 Olympics CMs
synopsis: As the Tokyo 2020 Olympic and Paralympic games approach various official animated promotional videos are created for the big event. Styles range from traditional animation, to stop-motion, to hybrid live-action.

title: Umi e Kite
synopsis: Music video for the song Umi e Kite by Masako Mori that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Kouji Nanke.

title: Yumi-chan no Hikkoshi: Sayonara Tsutomu-kun
synopsis: A music video for the song "Yumi-chan no Hikkoshi: Sayonara Tsutomu-kun" by Keiji Kawahashi (川橋啓史), and Kako Ootsuko (大塚佳子). Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Mo Huan Zhu Luo Ji
synopsis:
The "first" season of Zhu Zhu Xia, its release format set the pattern and story style for later seasons.

GG Bond was a martial artist pig in a prehistoric world where resources are strained by overpopulation. At the cost of his own life, he entrusted a powerful "Magic Wisdom Ball" to Wang Xiaoer that could be used to save the environment. Wang Xiaoer instead used the ball for his own gain. When G.G. Bond is reincarnated and sees what Wang Xiaoer has done, he knows it is up to him to fix the problem, no matter what Wang Xiaoer tries to do to stop him.

(Source: Wikipedia)

title: Aika-chan no Chikyuu
synopsis:
The author of the manga Secrets of the World was only 12 years old, and she died days after completing it. Aika Tsubota's parents published her environmentally themed story in her memory, and this one-shot anime was the eventual result, sponsored in part by a charity opposing the pollution of the oceans. In 1995, Secrets of the World itself was animated as a two-part video series under the auspices of the Japanese Department of the Environment.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Chirorin Mura Monogatari: Tomkurupii no Jishin Youjin
synopsis: An earthquake disaster prevention anime starring the Chirorin Mura Monogatari main cast.

title: Gum Shaara
synopsis: Official Minna no Uta music video for Gum Shaara sung by Kobayashi Katsuya.

title: Kaijuu Step Wandabada
synopsis: Anime based on the picture book Kaijuu Step, which features monsters from Ultraman series

title: Kakusensou
synopsis: An educational film about nuclear warfare and the effects it has on the environment as told by a talking frog.

title: Kkoma Bus Tayo 3
synopsis: The third season of Kkoma Bus Tayo.

title: Machibouke
synopsis: There was a tree stump at the corner of a farmer's field. A speeding rabbit broke its neck and died on it. Rabbits make for a great meal and sell well on the market so the farmer decided to give up farming and just wait for more rabbits to come hit the stump and die again. But he waited and waited and no new rabbits came. Leaving his crops to fail and himself rabbit-less. The song is supposed to teach the lesson of waiting in vain. It's okay to have an optimistic view on something but do not idly sit around waiting for it to happen because it might not. Similar to the Western adage "don't count your chickens before they hatch."

title: Mebuki
synopsis: An educational film about listening to your inner voice when you see discrimination. Social customs and values should not override cruelty and abuse done upon others.

title: Power Battle Watch Car
synopsis:
The series is set in the near future, when an automobile company named JHC Motors is depicted to have created the Watch Cars, which are miniature sentient robotic cars that are supposed to have become good companions to children and adults alike. Watch Cars are depicted to have become a global trend. There is a Battle League where Watch Cars and their trainers battle. Jino, one of the young Watch Car Masters, goes to the Watch Car Battle League with his Watch Car Blue-will, but The Rangers of Darkness an evil force to takeover al the watch cars in The city, Jino and his friends must stop them. 

(Source: Wiki)

title: Rokuko-chan
synopsis: Japan Animation Association (JAA) sponsored opening animation for a 6-person omnibus animation project planned in the future.

title: Ryuu no Me no Namida
synopsis: A pure hearted boy becomes friends with a dragon that people are afraid of.

title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Fuwa Fuwa Fuwaly to Kumo no Kuni
synopsis:
Anpanman, his friends, and the cloud child Fuwari strive to save Cloud Country. In order for flowers and plants to be healthy, Cloud Country travels to distribute clouds that can make rain and rainbows to various towns and stars. A cloud baby born in Cloud Country runs across Baikinman and his friends. After meeting them, the baby gets the name Fuwari and quickly grows while developing a bond with Dokin-chan.

(Source: ANN)

title: Wonderful World: Ganmen Shintaisou
synopsis: A whimsical calisthenics song about how wonderful the world is from grand things like romantic proposals to mundane things like good dental care.

title: Oyama no Taishou
synopsis: A song adaptation of the children's game King of the Hill.

title: Fruits 5 Shimai
synopsis: Minna no Uta clip about fruit sisters trying to decide who's the sweetest, with song by Momoiro Clover Z.

title: Hana Ichi Monme (OVA)
synopsis:
Animated versions of tales that won the Short Story Prize in the Hanaichi Monme bulletin, including Noboru and the Wildcat, The Misleading Friends, Sanma 's March, Red Mail-Box on the Mountain-Tot), and One Sunday Morning at the Beginning of May.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Juuroku Jizou Monogatari: Sensou no Gisei ni Natta Kodomo-tachi
synopsis: 1 day before the end of WWII for Japan in September 1944 Sadamitsu, Tokushima was under one final air raid. Elementary school boys proceeded to carry out their evacuation policy and many became victims.

title: Kaitou Yumenosuke
synopsis: Kaitou Yumenosuke is dream magician who loves eating the happy dreams of people.

title: Ken-chan to Bouen Kazoku
synopsis: A film about the importance of fireproof products in the household.

title: Kensaku to Enjin no Christmas
synopsis: An entirely 3DCG Christmas episode of Kensaku to Enjin.

title: Okaasan no Kao
synopsis: An ekaki uta of the singer's mother's portrait.

title: Bai Bian Zhu Zhu Xia
synopsis: This time G.G. Bond has transformed into an angel. He's on a 3 month trial period to help a monster to make sure they stay on the right path.

title: Boku to Sakana no Monogatari
synopsis: A music video for the song "Boku to Sakana no Monogatari" by Swimy. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Chiisai Aki Mitsuketa (1982)
synopsis: Another Minna no Uta adaptation of Chiisai Aki Mitsuketa.

title: Kitsune no Kan Chigai
synopsis: An educational film about how some religious beliefs and folklore and superstitions are in damaging in modern Japan.

title: Magical Maho
synopsis: A children's musical VHS about a magical girl and her family who move the Earth and encounter issues transitions to a life that isn't focused on magic.

title: Minna no Doutoku
synopsis: DVD collections that feature various stories with morals aimed at children. The DVDs come with supplementary reading as these videos are meant for a classroom setting.

title: Nibiki no Neko to Genkina Kazoku
synopsis: An educational film following a family that moved to Tokyo after the Kobe earthquake and the passive discrimination they received.

title: Okoru yo!
synopsis: A music video for the song "Okoru yo!" by Tetsuo Miyoshi. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Qingwa Wangguo: Zhi Bingdong Da Maoxian
synopsis:
For centuries, the Crystal Frog has protected the Frog Kingdom with its magic. When One-Eye plots to steal the artifact and rule the land, the Frog King asks Freddy and the Frog Princess to undertake a bold journey through forest, desert, river rapids, and icy caverns. But as the protectors arrive, it becomes clear that One-Eye may have led them into a trap.

(Source: Redbox)

title: Uchuu Bouei-tai Taabou no Shinkirou Hoshi wo Sukue!
synopsis: King Kaniwa has robbed the flower's "preciousness" which gives life to all stars. Taabou stands up to rescue the desert star.

title: Umi no Koumori
synopsis: An educational film teaching the concept of "innocent till proven guilty".

title: Waga Na wa Cowboy
synopsis: A child plays cowboy with their wooden horse.

title: Washimo 6th Season
synopsis: Sixth season of the Washimo series.

title: Yasashii Ookami
synopsis: Bullying was what kept a timid wolf from showing kindness, but what was the real strength he showed?

title: Arigatou (2010)
synopsis: A song about how encounters in your casual life and ability to connect with others through smiling is a treasure that carries with you for a lifetime.

title: Fure! Fure! Daijoubu!
synopsis: A song encouraging people to keep fighting and that everything's okay even when things seem bad like a loss at a game or a getting rejected from a confession.

title: Kaakaa Karasu no Kanzaburou
synopsis: A focus on crows and how they interact with all different kinds of animals and people in Japan.

title: Mirai Kara no Message
synopsis: An educational film about adoption discrimination in Japan. How those who are adopted are seen as rejects of society and the public koseki allows for companies to see the family tree of applicants and not hire/fire employees based on the fact that they're adopted.

title: Santa no Yama Yousei no Mori
synopsis: A two volume VHS release about Santa Claus. The first volume is about how elves try to keep Santa from moving from the cold North Pole. The second volume is about Santa trying to go on a diet because he's eating too much of Mrs. Clause's delicious food.

title: Shounen H ga Mita Sensou
synopsis: An educational anime about the Pacific War. Based on the autobiographical best selling work by Kappa Senoo.

title: Shutter Chance
synopsis: An educational film showing the importance of perusing dreams and the depression that occurs when parents force their children's careers into what they want rather than what the child wants.

title: Warai Kawasemi ni Hanasu na yo
synopsis: A music video for the song "Warai Kawasemi ni Hanasu na yo" by Toshie Kusunoki (楠トシエ). Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Zhu Zhu Xia: Jing Qiu Xiao Yingxiong
synopsis: In honor of the 2018 World Cup, this season of GG Bond focuses on sports team competition, team spirit, and personal growth as they compete in the Meteor League.

title: Arigatou
synopsis: A Minna no Uta music video sung by Keiko Utsumi and animated by Nanke Kouji. It has no relation to the Minna no Uta music video from 2010 which shares the name name.

title: Chiisai Aki Mitsuketa
synopsis: Children play hide-and-seek.

title: Echo: Kodama Suru Uta
synopsis: A young boy is moving away, he has a tearful farewell with his friends. Their words of encouragement and love echo against the ocean waves and in his heart.

title: Hoshizora no Orgel
synopsis: A little boy who is having trouble sleeping meets with the constellations and listens to their soothing music.

title: Ken-chan
synopsis: A music video for the song "Ken-chan" by Yuuki Kudou. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Kizuna: Ningen no Uta Part 2
synopsis: An educational film about marriage discrimination; how hard it is for a lower class person to marry into upper class.

title: Koinu no Blue
synopsis: A man plays with his puppy through the different seasons but the dog passes away. The man feels blue that he lost his best friend but doesn't regret the time he spent with it.

title: Kumori Nochi Hare
synopsis: An educational film about bullying, it follows a girl who is bullied so much that she loses the ability to speak.

title: Mameushi-kun no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: An educational film about traffic safety staring Mameushi-kun.

title: Na mo Nai Hana no Youni
synopsis: Various people take care of their pet dogs.

title: Obake de Ii kara Hayaku Kite
synopsis: A metaphorical expression of a child who got separated from their mother at a department store and is overwhelmed by the anxiety with having to seek a stranger for help (and the experience of being in the security room for lost children).

title: Oyashirazu
synopsis: A metaphorical song about the anxiety, frustration, lonliness, and heartache felt during puberty. Like that of wisdom teeth growing in, the pain follows you everywhere.

title: Pittanko! Taiyou-sensei to Pittanko
synopsis: Two school children disrupt the shape of their sun teacher.

title: Pokopon no Kitsune-gawa Onsen Henshin Gassen
synopsis: Tanuki and kitsune battle it out at a hot spring in this Sanrio anime.

title: Santa-san wa Dai Isogashi
synopsis: A short anime about what Santa does when he's not delivering presents.

title: Ten made Tobaso
synopsis: A little girl astronaut crashes her small ship out in space. There is a scientist there with his own much larger crashed ship. They spent time together as he repairs her ship and  have a tearful departure.

title: Uchuu Seibutsu Jirou
synopsis:
A mysterious cat from space called Uchuu Sebutsu Jirou has come to Earth. Jirou is often seen in places with music.

Jirou was created for promotional character goods purposes with toys, books, stickers, etc. This short promotional video will also be streamed at movie theaters starting on October 25, 2019.

title: Kappa no Kui Kuo Kua
synopsis:
Music video for the song Kappa no Kui Kuo Kua by Japanese vocal group Duke Aces and actress Nobue Ichitani that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Yoji Kuri.

The video aired in 1975, but was considered lost media some time later. It was recovered thanks to the Minna no Uta Hakkutsu Project.

title: Kemy Tamheomdae
synopsis: A season of Kemy, where the gang goes on expeditions to explore nature. This season is similar to the original Kemy Lang Buka Chaka where some of the footage is live action nature. Still, Buka and Chaka do not reprise their roles in this season either.

title: Kogitsune no Shouboutai
synopsis: The three kitsune brothers have moved away from the country and into the city. They use their transformation powers to become young men and start firefighting school to become firefighters.

title: Kusakeiba
synopsis: A Minna no Uta version of the classic English song "Camptown Races."

title: Meiwaku Danchi
synopsis: 6 children sit in front of the classroom and constantly gossip. When one of them is absent for three days due to a cold, the rest remain quiet as they don't want to leave the other child out from day-to-day gossip.

title: Mimizuku to Tsuki-sama
synopsis: An educational film about playground bullying.

title: Mina no Mura to Mori
synopsis:
While Mina's family is in the forest, fire breaks out. They decide to take care of Lolo, the baby monkey, who lost his home and family due to the forest fire. An environmentalist visits Mina's village and invites the villagers to the field to talk about the forest. Having realized the importance of the forest, Mina and the villagers decide to plant trees in the burned field.

(Source: ACCU)

title: Tanoshii ne
synopsis: Three girls have fun playing hand-clapping games.

title: Tobiuo no Boy wa Byouki Desu
synopsis:
An anime about Operation Castle and the demise of the crew on the Daigo Fukuryuu Maru (S.S. Lucky Dragon 5). On March 1st 1954, a hydrogen bomb went off (that ended up being similar sized to the atomic bomb dropped on Hiroshima). The radioactive ash fell on the crew, poisoning them.
The anime deviates into fantasy as the ash also affected the marine life--that talk and wear human clothing and is the main focus of the movie; how the radioactive ash affected the talking fish.

title: Wa Wa Wa Wappi-chan 2nd Season
synopsis: The second season of Wa Wa Wa Wappi-chan that focuses on the Japanese language more so than the Japanese culture. The opening episode starts with a marathon in Watt Warp Town.

title: Yuuki no Hana ga Hiraku Toki: Yanase Takashi to Anpanman no Monogatari
synopsis: A biographical anime about Sore Ike! Anpanman creator Takashi Yanase, based on Kumiko Kakehashi's novel of the same name, and celebrates what would have been the 100th birthday of the manga creator.

title: Chikyuu wa Guruguru Merry-Go-Round
synopsis: (No synopsis yet.)

title: Flamingo Waltz
synopsis: Various jungle animals come to look at the flamingos dance a waltz.

title: Gomennasai
synopsis: An anthropomorphic dog tires to do his best but makes careless errors. Such as cleaning the floors and dumping the bucket of dirty water out the window...which drenches a teacher walking by. He always tries to apologize for his mistakes.

title: Huoli Shaonian Wang 3: Xuji
synopsis: A 26-episode second season sequel to Huoli Shaonian Wang 3. It aired 2 years after the original and focuses on the Blazing Team in a global competition against teams of other nations.

title: Kaijuu ga Yattekuru
synopsis: Animals at a zoo hear that a kaijuu is coming. Like a game of "Telephone" they hear bits and pieces of what the kaijuu looks like which gets distorted each time the information is passed on. In the end, it was just a normal zoo animal joining the exhibits.

title: Makeruna! Senta: Sayonara Ijime Mushi
synopsis: Human beings as well as other creatures have a cruel heart. Everyone thinks that all they're doing is bullying insects. In this anime each individual is confronted with the bullying and asked about it; their replies show the ugliness of their own hearts.

title: Mina no Mura to Kawa
synopsis:
Mina's village life seems peaceful as ever, yet some changes in their environment begin to affect their daily life. One evening, Mina's family get food poisoning from eating polluted river fish. Later that evening, a heavy rainstorm hits the village, and water from the polluted river flows into the well. Having taken medicine with unboiled well water, the family's health condition worsens. Mina, having learnt the causes of her family's illness, decides to improve the village environment.

(Source: ACCU)

title: Momotarou no Hi Asobi Yameyou! Hi no Youjin
synopsis: An educational "don't play with fire" safety video for kids featuring characters from the classic Momotarou folktale.

title: Niji no Kakehashi
synopsis: Satoshi is a popular boy thanks to his success in soccer. Kaori becomes jealous and spreads rumors that Satoshi was of low class birth. The school begins to shun Satoshi to the point that he stops playing soccer. When Kaori's house is damaged by a landslide Satoshi comes to help.

title: Shiawase Daifuku
synopsis: A music video for the song "Shiawase Daifuku" by Sansaro (三叉路). Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Union Union
synopsis: "It is the opening movie made for a friend's marriage ceremony" by director/animator Hiroco Ichinose.

title: Wasurenai yo
synopsis: The feelings of support an love parents give to their newborn child. They wish for their precious child to never forget how much they mean the world to them.

title: Yoninme no Ousama
synopsis: A song about the three wise men, and how there was a fourth one but he was really easy going and never ended up going on the journey to meet the newborn Jesus.

title: Yume no Tochuu de
synopsis: A song about the softness you feel when you dream. Like an old friend or family, it is inviting no matter how much you struggle when you are awake.

title: Asonde Oboeru Gakushuu DVD
synopsis: An educational DVD series meant to teach children their ABC's, how to read time, simple math, and geography.

title: Chikyuu to no Yakusoku
synopsis: An educational anime part of the "Save our mother earth" project made to raise the awareness about global warming.

title: Hotaru Koi
synopsis: Kids go looking for fireflies in the night.

title: Kkoma Bus Tayo-ui Ace Guchuljakjeon
synopsis:
It all starts when Duri lost his favorite sport car “Ace”. As Duri accidentally drops Ace on the road while he’s running, Rubby found Ace on the road while he was cleaning the street. Rubby thought it was garbage, so threw Ace away on the garbage dumb. So as Hana, Duri and Tayo rushed and went to find Ace, he was already taken away to the Land of Toys! Toy Land is where old and abandoned toys come to live together without humans! (Only lucky toys though!) Will Duri be able to find Ace and bring him back? It will be a fun but a long adventure, so come with us!

(Source: Official YouTube channel)

title: Minna de Tonda
synopsis: An educational film about compassion. The story follows a class trying to break a jump rope record and one student is terrible at the task. The issue causes a divide in the classroom.

title: Ojarumaru no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: Traffic safety video starring the cast of Ojarumaru.

title: Papan Ga Panda!
synopsis: A series of shorts broadcasted on Kids Station. The star a Panda (with other animals present) as they do quick skits usually revolving around singing, dancing, and exercise.

title: Prism Season
synopsis:
In a gentle adaptation of Megume Nagata's book Flowers Wait for the Moon, a girl grows up, falls in love, and becomes a mother, realizing that her childhood is now forever behind her. 

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Shibuzome Ikki: Ashita ni Kakeru Niji
synopsis: An educational film about the Shibuzome Uprising.

title: Soratobu Penguin
synopsis: Two penguins in love soar with emotions.

title: Uchuu Bouei-tai Taabou no Toki no Tomatta Hoshi
synopsis: The stars have stopped moving! It's up to Taabou to find out what's causing them to freeze in time.

title: Youki ni Utaeba
synopsis: The Japanese version of the Mexican folk song Las Chiapanecas, believed to be composed by Bulmaro López Fernández, with lyrics later added by Juan Arozamena. The video was animated by Yoji Kuri, accompanied by Japanese male chorus group Dark Ducks.

title: Kkoma Bus Tayo 2
synopsis: The second season of Kkoma Bus Tayo.

title: Li'l Chillun'
synopsis: Li'l Chillun' is a curious snow child who loves to bring happiness to others. It's Christmas Eve and houses in the village leave out presents for Li'l Chillun' as a thank you.

title: Mebae no Ashita
synopsis: An educational film about trying to see others by 'walking a mile in their shoes'. This one focuses on a listless teenager who is having trouble with his university entrance examinations and his father harping on him; and a pregnant woman who wants to work after the birth but her husband thinks it's wrong because a woman's place is in the home.

title: Minna Ichiban!
synopsis: An educational film about seeing the best in people.

title: Nanatsuko Nezumi Series
synopsis: Seven mouse children and their normal lives. Episode 1 follows mother mouse's struggle to keep her children happy by playing ressha gokko only for them to run into danger with a snake. Episode 2 follows father mouse as receives a letter from a friend asking to help out in the forest, the whole family decides to go but the children tire easily from the activities. Episode 3 is set in winter, the children help their mother with her errands.

title: Present
synopsis: An educational film about bullying. Ayaka gives a hand made picture from to Miyuki for her birthday. Miyuki likes expensive things and starts to hate Ayaka for the shabby gift, going so far as to have the class turn on Ayaka as well. The bullying continues to the point where Ayaka stops comming to school.

title: Somei-ka no Hi no Youjin: Bouka no Tebiki Katei-hen
synopsis: An educational fire safety video for kids and their families at home.

title: Stone Age Episode 0
synopsis: The introductory episode of Stone Age before its formal TV broadcast started two months later.

title: Tejina Shi
synopsis: An educational film meant to teach morals, to elementary through high school children.

title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tai Lang: Zhi Fei Ma Qi Yu Ji
synopsis:
In fairytales, the handsome prince, with some help from friendly dwarves, always marries the beautiful princess and lives happily ever after with her. This, unfortunately, is not the case for Prince Pegasus. Due to the meddling of Dwarf Pegasus, Prince Pegasus is not only stopped from marrying his princess, but also falls from Pegasus City down to Green Green Pastures! Now, it's up to Pleasant Goat and his friends to help Prince Pegasus return to his home! As always, though, Big Big Wolf is closely following the goats... 

(source: YesAsia)

title: Kaiten Mokuba ni Boku to Neko
synopsis: "Encounters" and "farewells" that everyone experiences; when thinking of "farewell", what does the empty heart feel?

title: Lei Su Deng Shandian Chong Xian 3
synopsis: The third season of Lei Su Deng Shandian Chong Xian.

title: Magical Puuta no Hi Asobi wa Abunai yo
synopsis: An educational "don't play with fire" safety video for kids.

title: Nobara (OVA)
synopsis: Soldiers in two countries, each protecting the stone monument at the border. As children they grew up together but war is separated them. This short explores the theme of "what is friendship".

title: Shimajirou to Tanjoubi no Ohoshi-sama
synopsis: A planetarium film exploring the different birthday signs alongside Shimajirou and friends.

title: Yi Kong Zhi Dian
synopsis: In a city of the future, many kids can play with Finger Skateboards--skateboards that can move a simulated character in a battle at will of the player. Our main character enters shop and joins the game along with his 3 friends. They kids go on many adventures and compete against Alexander, the son of a rival company competing against the original shop.

title: Ashita Aou ne
synopsis: Three best friends play as much as they can, right up until the sun sets, and vow to meet again tomorrow for more fun.

title: Chibikko Cowboy
synopsis: A little boy has fun being a cowboy out in the Wild West.

title: Inori no Te
synopsis: An educational anime about Hans Dürer.

title: Jin Ken Mamoru-kun to Ayumi-chan Sekai wo Shiawase ni
synopsis: Character designs by Takashi Yanase, creator of Anpanman, this official Ministry of Justice commissioned anime teachers children about how to peruse happiness for themselves and others through truth.

title: Korogashi-ya no Pun
synopsis: A dung beetle becomes too overzealous at rolling anything remotely round.

title: Mado (Music)
synopsis: Open the windows of your mind. The scenery of the world is irreplaceable and while you may love the past but you shouldn't let it cloud what you see in front of you right this very moment.

title: Mienu Me ni Kanjita Kumotoriyama no Asahi
synopsis: A woman climbs up the highest peak of the Kumotori moutain to see the sunrise. The awe-inspiring visual reminds her of her rough childhood.

title: Neko Neko Nihonshi 4th Season
synopsis: (No synopsis yet.)

title: Otoshidama
synopsis: A music video for the song "Otoshidama" by Hikari Ishida. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Shiro no Kanga"roo" no Uta
synopsis: A musical web short by Asami Ike made in honor of Roo-kun, an albino kangaroo born this year at the Kanazawa Zoo. Two versions of the video were posted. One in a normal horizontal video streaming format, and a second in a vertical streaming format meant to accommodate phone users.

title: Tabidachi no Hi ni
synopsis: An educational film about family issues surrounding a wedding. Typical wedding tropes seen in various media are displayed realistically here. Such as the lack of respect a mother-in-law gives her soon to be daughter-in-law, monetary stress between the two families, stereotyping the other family and thinking poorly of them, and other self-centered ideas.

title: Bokunchi no Chabo
synopsis: A chicken wearing glasses and a tie has a harsh voice and annoys those around him.

title: Duel Masters Zero: Tokubetsu-hen - Tamashii Shoukan Special!
synopsis: The 25th episode of Duel Masters Zero, it acted as a side-story recap episode going over the season's hottest duels.

title: Funi Funi Marshmallow
synopsis: An Kamio Japan character line, Funi Funi Marshmallow was originally released as a 3DS game people could purchase from the Japan Nintendo eShop. Now these cute marshmallow critters have their own show!

title: Futari no Tarou
synopsis: A modern boy Tarou timeslips into the Edo period and experiences the severity of the caste system.

title: Hanakappa no Koutsuu Anzen: Cake wo Momomete Migi, Hidari, Migi
synopsis: An educational film about traffic safety staring Hanakappa.

title: Irotoridori
synopsis: A music video for Yuzu's song "Irotoridori."

title: Kitty to Mimmy no Atarashii Kasa
synopsis: Hello Kitty franchise's first puppet animation work. Kitty and Mimmy are twin kittens. Two of them have been staying inside on a rainy day get a souvenir from mother who came home; an umbrella with different colors and boots. The two are delighted, but rain has stopped. Kitty and Mimmy wish for rain again to go out with an umbrella, despite the good weather the next day. The long-awaited rain will soon come.

title: Mayuge Dance
synopsis: An eyebrows appreciation music video.

title: Naze
synopsis: A music video for the song by Keropons and Sayama Children's Choir that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta Program.

title: Negaigoto no Mochigusare
synopsis: A music video for the song "Negaigoto no Mochigusare" by AKB48. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Okaasan no Ki
synopsis:
Based on a book by Okawa Etsuo.

In 1937 a mother with 7 children has to see her eldest three sons go off to war. She plants Paulownia tree seeds and prays to the trees every day for her sons to come back safely.

title: Qingwa Wangguo
synopsis:
When the Frog King announces that the winner of the Froglympics will win the hand of his daughter, Princess Froglegs, in marriage, she runs away. Disguised as a commoner, Princess Froglegs befriends street vendor, Freddie, and begins training with him for the games--determined that she will win and thwart her Father's plans of marriage. Meanwhile, the villainous Serpent has ideas of his own to ruin the Froglympics and take over the kingdom. With a little luck, and a little help from their trusty Sidekick, Freddie and Princess Froglegs must save Frog Kingdom from the evil Serpent. 

(Source: Amazon.com)

title: Soba no Hana Saita Hi
synopsis: An educational film about environmentalism.

title: Unicorn no Kyupi
synopsis:
Unicorn no Kyupi is a helpful sprite that lives in the kitchen and polishes dirty pots and pans clean with its fluffy white body. Harigorou, a rival sprite shaped like a hedgehog, tries to interfere. 

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title: Wasurerumonka!
synopsis: An educational film meant to inspire people and to not pity those with disabilities.

title: Yamete! Writer Asobi: Doubutsu Mura no Shouboutai Shutsu Dou
synopsis: An educational fire safety video for kids to be wary of dry paper and magazine garbage getting set on fire.

title: Yeastken.
synopsis: Yeastken (portmanteau of yeast and the japanese word aiken for pet dogs) are yeast dogs. They snuck into a baker's dough and now they're living dog breads.

title: Anzen Kakunin: Kenta to Nyanta no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: Kenta and Nyanta learn about traffic safety and that even if they're following the law, they still need to be aware of their surroundings for safety in case drivers aren't.

title: Cat's Eye Love
synopsis: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder, in this case, it's a cat who loves milk cookies and sees the moon as a wonderful treat.

title: Chameleon
synopsis: A chameleon tries to catch the moon at night with his tongue and eventually turns into a beautiful shining golden color.

title: Kii-chan Watashi, Umarete Kite Yokatta!
synopsis: An educational film about how a girl with a disability is able to overcome her restricted lifestyle and sew a yukata for her sister's wedding. The lesson is that those with disabilities are not limited to a life of nothing, that with encouragement and positive attitudes of the people around them--they are able to great things like everyone else leaving with the tag line of the movie "I'm glad I was born".

title: Larva Island Season 2
synopsis: The 2nd season of Larva Island. Chuck's life on the island turns for the worse when the volcano becomes active, a hurricane visits, and of course all the critters getting in his way with their antics.

title: Ningen no Uta
synopsis: For the first time, 18 year old Mitsuko is facing discrimination as she tries to pursue a career.

title: Ninja Negizou
synopsis: A music video for the song "Ninja Negizou" by Alberto Shiroma. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Obaachan no Takaramono
synopsis: A music video for the song "Obaachan no Takaramono" by Yoshiko Kawase. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Okaasan, Nakanaide
synopsis: An educational anime about the importance of life.

title: Usagi to Kame no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: An educational film about traffic safety staring the Tortoise and the Hare.

title: Utsukushii Message
synopsis: An educational film about discrimination in Japan.

title: Wa Wa Wa Wappi-chan
synopsis:
In a world where past and future connect, cute little catgirl Wappi-chan learns the meaning of Japanese culture by interacting with the strange beings and spirits who inhabit Watt Warp Town. 

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Chibi Gojira
synopsis: Chibi Gojira has now partnered with TOHO Cinemas for a countdown animation. The short was released on Godzilla franchise's official YouTube channel and will air in all TOHO Cinemas before every film starting on the coming weekend. This marks the 65th anniversary of Godzilla and TOHO is doing various promotions for the iconic franchise.

title: Crayon no Hoshi
synopsis: An educational film about a teamwork. A group of crayons get a message that they can meet with the a king star if they have great values. Bickering ensues and they have to work together to prove their worth to meet the king.

title: Hasami Togi
synopsis: A man sings a song while sharpening scissors as a part of his mobile business.

title: Huoli Shaonian Wang 3
synopsis:
Huoli Shaonian Wang is a Chinese multi-media franchise created to sell yoyo toys to children. Huoli Shaonian Wang 3 is the first animated season in the franchise but the 3rd story chronologically.

The show focuses on competitive schools that hold yo-yo contests. Each team has their own issues that they solve. Each yoyo has a name that reflects the toy's design. The show makes use of minor special effects in order to portray magic/spirit/chi and the speed of the yoyo. These "magic spells" are "battling" and the person whose "magic" remains, wins. 

(Source: Wiki)

title: Ichinen Ikkumi
synopsis:
Based on a well known children's book series by Ryugi Goto (Story) and Hasegawa Tomoko (Illustrations).

Follows the adventure of a naughty boy and the rest of the kids in his classroom.

title: Jishin ga Kitarou Dousuru? Mushi Mushi Mura no Bousai Kunren
synopsis: An educational disaster safety video for kids featuring talking insects.

title: Koe wo Kikasete
synopsis: An educational film about mobile phone addictions in Japan.

title: Koutsuu Anzen de Gozaru Ninja Hattori-kun
synopsis: A traffic safety anime starring the cast of Ninja Hattori-kun.

title: Mr. Men Little Miss
synopsis: Sanrio's rendition of the Mr. Men and Little Miss British book franchise. Each episode is focused on one of the characters while a narrator exuberantly explains their actions.

title: Ojiichan no Komoriuta
synopsis: A music video for the song "Ojiichan no Komoriuta" by Yuuji Akimoto. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Sayounara Kaba-kun
synopsis:
A mixture of live action and animation telling the true story of the animals of Tokyo's Ueno Zoo during the harsh days of bombing raids and shortages that took their toll during World War II. Focusing on the hippos, who were eventually butchered for food in the closing days of the conflict, Newtype called the story, "a study of the tragedy of war and a prayer for peace."

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: KakoPad: Nagaoka Hanabi Monogatari
synopsis:
An educational web anime where an apathetic elementary student Yukita, who is visiting his grandfather along with his sister, clicks a mysterious app on his KakoPad. The two children are suddenly teleported back to August 1, 1945--the same date as the Nagaoka air raid.

The Nagaoka Fireworks Festival was founded in 1946. The event is in remembrance of those who died in WW2, specifically with the three shiragiku (white chrysanthemum fireworks) launched. The anime itself was commissioned by the foundation that organizes the Nagaoka Fireworks Festival. In 2003 and onward, the fireworks officially starts at 10:30pm, the same time the bombing began; and the duration of the short is 10min30sec long as well to mirror this very important time.

title: Kokoro no Hanataba
synopsis: A sweet story about an old man who went around town planting seeds everywhere in order for flowers to bloom for his granddaughter.

title: Mirai e no Niji: Boku no Ojisan wa, Hansen-byou
synopsis: An educational film out leprosy. As of 2009, there are 2,600 people with leprosy in Japan--all of whom are living in sanatoriums and hospitals. The story follows two kids going to visit their uncle who lives in a sanatorium.

title: Niji no Kizuna
synopsis: An educational film about the bystander effect and indifference in Japan. A mentality that "it's not happening to me, so it's not my problem" towards the discrimination of others, those suffering from disease, those displaced by the 2011 Touhoku earthquake, etc.

title: Saru Tarou Jishin ni wa Makenai zo!: Jishin e no Sonae Dai Sakusen
synopsis: An educational earthquake disaster safety video for kids.

title: The★Fire G-Men
synopsis: Part of Safety Education Anime series.

title: Xiong Chumo Zhi: Xiong Zin Guilai
synopsis:
A story of friends old and new, of being lost but most importantly being found; The Big Top Secret follows Briar as he is whisked away from the home he knows and plunged head first into the ranks of a traveling circus. The struggling circus, led by Hugo the Gorilla, is on its last leg and in desperate need of a boost. Frustrated with his brother, Bramble, and the rest of his forest friends, Briar finds a new and welcoming home among Wolfgang’s Big Top. Briar brings life back to the circus and quickly finds happiness in his new life filled with new friends and fame. While rising to the top has its benefits, it also comes with a price. After searching high and low, Bramble and his forest friends are thrilled to have found their lost Briar, but Briar is not so sure that he wants to be found. He doesn’t want to leave his perfect new life at the big top but even the most perfect-seeming things have dark sides. Through trials and chases and trains, all of the animals learn what it is to belong and the true meaning of family.

(Source: Official YouTube Channel)

title: Bero-dashi Chonma
synopsis:
Based on a novel by Ryusuke Saito.

An educational film about oppressed farmers in the Edo period who tried to better themselves only to get crucified.

title: Chiisana Tegami
synopsis: Various people try to write a small letter to those significant in their lives.

title: Chuldong! Super Wings
synopsis:
Super Wings follows the adventures of an adorable jet plane named Jett who travels around the world delivering packages to children. On every delivery, Jett encounters new problems that he must solve with the help of his friends the "Super Wings": Dizzy, Jerome and Donnie. Together, the team explores different countries and learns the diversity of new cultures.

(Source: Official YouTube channel)

title: Daruma-chan
synopsis:
Based on children's books of the same name for each episode. 

The story follows Daruma-chan and his interactions with other creatures like Rabbit-chan or Tengu-chan.

title: Hiromi
synopsis: A song about a little girl named Hiromi who is the object of affection of a little boy.

title: Minikui Ahiru no Ko
synopsis: An stop-motion puppet animation adaptation of The Ugly Duckling Hans Christian Andersen story.

title: Muumin to Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: A traffic safety anime starring the cast of Muumin commissioned by Toyota Motor.

title: Neko Neko Gong Show
synopsis: A collaboration between Kihara Yousuke and studio dwarf. Kihara is most famous for being the head artist for the PS2/GameCube game Ribbit King and the anime Nikoniko♪Connie-chan. Neko Neko Gong Show is a talent show for cats, where if their skits are bad, get a gong (made from a cat food tin can lid) hit to boot them off.

title: Nihon no Obake-banashi
synopsis: Classic Japanese ghost stories for children.

title: Son Gokuu no Koutsuu Rule Shugyou Chuu
synopsis: An educational film about traffic safety staring the Saiyuuki cast.

title: Susume! Shinji-kun
synopsis: A music video for the song "Susume! Shinji-kun" by Youko Seri that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program.

title: Tobidashi wa Abunaizo! Mushi Mushi Mura no Koutsuu Anzen
synopsis: An educational film about traffic safety starring insects. This film talks about more advanced traffic safety rules.

title: Yumearu Ugoku Ehon
synopsis: Short animations for the Ugoku Ehon (Moving Picture Book) line by the Yumearu company. Yumearu specializes in children's education.

title: Yuujou no Kickoff
synopsis: Makoto was a great soccer player in his elementary school team. When he moves to another school he is bullied. Through football he is able to turn their actions around.

title: Zukkoke Sannin-gumi: Kusunoki Yashiki no Guruguru-sama
synopsis: (No synopsis yet.)

title: Anime Tengu no Kakuresato
synopsis: An educational anime targeting environmental problems (such as the feral boar population in Japan) with a twist as two children become involved with the tengu that live in the mountains.

title: Anzen no Shiteiseki Child Seat
synopsis: An educational anime about the importance and purpose of child seats in cars.

title: Catch: Tsugi no Natsu ga Kuru You ni
synopsis: A young couple enjoys the summer beach side and hope that their next summer is just as fun and full of love.

title: Christmas Carol
synopsis: An anime adaptation of Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol.

title: Eiga de Utaou! Mother Goose
synopsis: A sing-a-long anime meant to teach Japanese children English. 4 DVD volumes feature an assorted amount of Mother Goose nursery rhymes.

title: Hanshin Awaji Daishinsai ni Manabu: Boku wa, Ano Hi wo Wasurenai.
synopsis: An educational film about the Great Hanshin earthquake (aka Kobe earthquake).

title: Hikari Sasu Sora e
synopsis: An educational film about LGBT human rights problems in Japan.

title: Hina no Uta
synopsis: A family of 13 ducklings live a very cute life at a pond.

title: Kemy Lang Buka Chaka
synopsis: This anime is a fusion of 3D CGI and live-action. Majority of the episodes are Kemy, Buka, and Chaka in their animated club house but other parts of the episodes are the characters imposed on live footage of nature. The program solves various questions by looking at the world with the vision of infants who are still immature in the world.

title: Kiniro no Kujira
synopsis: An educational film about leukemia in Japan.

title: Kokoro no Catchball
synopsis: An educational anime about the importance of having a connection to the community.

title: Monpy
synopsis: An NHK toddler's anime following a monkey named Monpy.

title: Nagareboshi no Okurimono
synopsis: (No synopsis yet.)

title: Tobidashicha dame!
synopsis: An educational film about traffic safety.

title: Yousei Chii-tan☆
synopsis:
The Asian small-clawed otter "fairy baby" character debuted on December 15, 2017. The "eternally 0-year-old" character has no gender, and they wear the turtle character Kame-chan on their head.

The mascot character is based on a real-world female pet otter of the same name, who gained a social media following big enough to become the honorary tourism ambassador of the city of Susaki, Kochi. 

(Source: ANN)

title: Jishin da!! Mii-chan no Bousai Kunren
synopsis: An educational disaster safety video for kids featuring Mii-chan the cat and Daiki-kun after their animal abuse issue from the previous educational short.

title: Kaze Gourmet
synopsis: A woman savors the scents of the wind from the past.

title: Kaze no Tabibito
synopsis: An educational film about wheel-chair bound people in Japan.

title: Kemy
synopsis:
Kemy is an animation series with some educational undertones targeting 5~7-year-old kids. The entire series is set against the backdrop of a supermarket. Viewing the animations, children will be able to imagine themselves in amidst all a supermarket has to offer. Children can join Kemy and his quest to figure out the answers to everyday questions. Buka and Chaka do not reprise their roles in this season.

(Source: korean-products.com)

title: Kuma no Nuigurumi
synopsis: A little girl loves a stuffed bear and takes it everywhere. At home she never puts it away causing her mom to trip over it. Over time it gets really beat up and raggedy and mom decides it's time to toss it out. Luckily the girl find it and tries her hand at stitching the raggedy bear into better condition.

title: Malta no Bouken
synopsis: (No synopsis yet.)

title: Minna ga Shitteru: Kokoro Atatamaru Natsukashii  Ohanashi Series
synopsis: Assorted children's fables. Ranging from the classic Japanese tale of Momotarou to the classic European tale of Gulliver's Travels.

title: Ninja Tamamaru
synopsis: A simple short anime series about a ninja named Tamamaru who is diligent and enthusiastic about his ninja training...but always fails at it.

title: Obake Nagaya
synopsis: A comedic tale about a haunted room.

title: Oz no Mahoutsukai no Koutsuu Anzen no Tabi
synopsis: An educational film about traffic safety staring the The Wizard of Oz cast.

title: Science Anime: Choudendou Monogatari
synopsis:
The science department of the Tosai Shinbun newspaper investigates a story on superconductors, learning all about the mysterious world of subzero electrical conductivity, the Meissner Effect, Brian Josephson's work on "tunneling" (flow across an insulating layer without application of voltage), and implications for super-computer technology in the 21st century. Meanwhile, attractive reporter Miss Ohashi begins to find bespectacled scientist Dr. Arai rather attractive.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Sentaku Jab Jab
synopsis: A little boy helps out his family by doing the laundry on a washing board.

title: Candy no Yume
synopsis: A listless woman named Candy dreams about love and the future while letting tears flow.

title: Chara to Otamajakushi Shima
synopsis:
The anime is set on the titular Musical Note Island, where the god of music is said to reside. The island is home to "instrument animals," who are born from music energy, and have parts of their body composed of a musical instrument. One day, a witch arrives at the island. The warrior girl Cara must go on a journey to defeat the witch and win back the peace on the island.

(Source: ANN)

title: Iwata Kunchi no Obaachan
synopsis: An educational film based on a true story of an elementary school boy bringing his wheel-chair bound grandmother to school in order for her to tell the story of her living through WW2 and the atomic bomb.

title: Karasu no Panya-san/Dorobou Gakkou
synopsis:
A double feature based on a best-selling children's books by Satoshi Hako.

Karasu no Panya-san is about a crow bakery in the forest run by a couple and their children.

Dorobou Gakkou is about the self-explanatory goings-on at an educational institute with a difference.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Tousan no Kiteki
